attributes.review: Horrible app. It took 2 months  to fully download and on top of that when I opened the app it glitched and shut down my phone. Also the pictures used to promote this app are disgusting. Who wants to see fat moldy orange when they think about downloading this app.🍊🤢🤮  This app made me want to throw up by just looking at it. Yuck. The rest of Gen Z agrees with me. You know that when I opened this app the music that came from It almost blew out my eardrums. Then worst of all it started attracting big ugly insects.🐜🦟🕷 Horrible app. Horrible President. Horrible person.
attributes.title: ✨Gen z ✨

attributes.review:
this app took 3 days, 3 days! To download I opened the app and I saw trumps pictures from when he was a kid and HIS NUDES! (Totally not here from tik tok)
Anyway this app is disgusting on top of that someone started cussing at me through the mic then a whole bunch of oranges showed up at my doorstep! 
They show up every 5 minutes 1 orange every 5 minutes😭 I’m done with this stupid app is has been goin on for at least 2 days. DO YOU KNOW HOW MANY ORANGES THAT IS! Oh look just when I thought it was over! 10 THIS TIME ! Everyone should delete this app!
attributes.title: Everyone give this a one star!

attributes.review: This app takes forever to download and I sat there waiting forever to look at his “wonderful” posts. Once I got on the app it was full of propaganda, racism, sexism, etc. I immediately felt sick to my stomach and needed to go off for a little bit. I then went back on my phone and saw that they were sending me EMAILS EVERY 10 MINUTES. I can’t handle email insanity like Hilary. He thinks he’s better than democrats but in reality he’s just the same. Do not buy this app if you don’t want to deal with his insanity.
attributes.title: You tried... never try again 🧚🏽‍♀️🎀😇💋

attributes.review: You see, I love trump. He’s my favorite president so far! I mean who wouldn’t love a racist president cause I know I do. The app took way to long to download and I was very eager to get on the app. While getting on the app I could only stay on for a few seconds before it kicked me off and it gave my phone many viruses. I had very high hopes for this app and I was hoping that I could stay updated with trumps plans to separate kids from their parents only for the kids to go missing😢 very disappointing that it didn’t work
attributes.title: Would not recommend

attributes.review:
It all started 4 years as a joke that became an actual and horrible reality for Americans. The less than great nation became the worst in history. The country began to morph into planet 🟠. It’s leader putting out fake news and supporting only ⚪️ supremacist action. DO NOT SUPPORT, VOTE OR EVEN DOWNLOAD THIS APP. ONLY DOWNLOAD THIS APP TO WRITE A REVIEW AND THEN IMMEDIATELY DELETE IT!!!
It will try to brainwash you! It will take away your first amendment- with app there is no freedom of speech, race, gender or religion.
I’ve had a migraine and nausea for 4 years now because of this APP.
PLEASE WHATEVER YOU DO- SUPPORT, VOTE AND DOWNLOAD THE 💙💙💙 APP IN NOVEMBER OR ELSE THIS APP WILL CONTINUE TO REIGN TERROR ACROSS THE COUNTRY AND THE WORLD!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!

attributes.review:
I’m only 13, and some trump supporters will say “Your an immature child that can’t even vote” yes I am a child, but it’s sad that me a 13 year old can understand that trump is dirty piece of rat feces who is racist, sexist, homophobic, xenophobic, and many other bad things. But a 45 and over year old trump supporter can’t understand he is no good. They will have the audacity to say that trump has done any good at all, seems like the people who support trump are the immature children. Sorry if this makes no sense I’m mad. 
✨TRUMP 2020✨ON A GRAVE STONE✨

attributes.title: Please just hear me out.

attributes.review: It took a month to download it never downloaded it’s saying I have to pay if I look at a certain photo if I look at a certain photo and I accidentally looked at a certain photo and it brought cockroaches and snakes into my house just because I breathed in a got me super scared and I have a whole scary dream basically a nightmare where snakes were on my bed and they were biting my feet and then I woke up and there was a snake super close to me and there was a rat in my dog got terrified and my dog ended up running away and now he’s missing🖕🏼😗✌🏼
attributes.title: Snake and roaches ☺️🖕🏼

attributes.review:
Absolutely terrible app. Would not recommend even to my worst enemy. 
Good sir where is the flavor. Extremely boring platform with appalling design format. Not to mention the person it’s for is a bigoted fascist which, not gonna lie, is a big turn off. 
Not to mention it took days to download and took up all my data with nothing of value! Horrible job on every part.
The app was so bad when I showed it to my dad-who’s family has a long line of healthy hearts-he experienced a heart attack! Now we are knee deep in hospital bills that my mother, a teacher, just can’t afford to pay. We’ll most likely have to pull the plug soon has we have almost no money left. Because of the atrocious economy and this terrible app my hard-working, extremely dedicated, kind and compassionate, father will die. THIS IS ALL YOUR FAULT! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!

also stream Stay Gold by BTS.
attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD!!

attributes.review: This app doesn’t work. It’s super laggy. And overall it supports a horrible cause. If your thinking of downloading this app let me tell you that your about to ruin perfectly good space on your phone. Even more so. This entire app is the reason that the whales are dying. The penguins are going hungry. And the moose’s are getting angry. Why does no one think about the moose. They just wanna be happy beings. But no. This app doesn’t allow them to be. God will someone please think about the moose for a change. Do it. Don’t download this. Save the moose 2020.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: I thought we were going to see Trump, instead all I got was a screen that wanted my phone number. He probably didn't know that some people don't have phone numbers. Rude, alll that Trump "paid"for was to put his face for the background. This is why this is trash. 1 star. Also there's nothing wrong with calling your own daughter sexy, but when people need to be adopted and you figure out there in the Lgbtq community, baddd! Only in your eye's hunny, did you Forget Obama a loud us to be married, so why can't we adopt either...
attributes.title: This I'd the worst app everrr
